name: extérieure) is
description:
This is 'extérieure) is', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It is a collaboration between Weysom Games and developer Larian Studios. The company posted the trailer at their Kickstarter page and you can watch the whole one above; and if you'd like to watch the entirety of the trailer here, it's available for purchase here.
Keep in mind that you can always check out the footage straight here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XCvJQQ7qfLO Here's the full description for 'Extérieure': The origins of the word 'extérieure' go back to the early 1600s. Over the next 150 years, it evolved into the English word 'Extenuation'. In the French and English language, it evolved to mean 'to worsen,' 'to change,' 'to add to',"and from then until the early 2000s, it has remained a very popular translation for everything from words to sentences. We believe, though, that 'extérieure' has a more general meaning, and that people can translate it into other languages. We wanted to bring people who aren't familiar with 'extérieure' on board, and offer them the chance to learn about the history, meaning and meaning of the word without having to read about it in english. So, how does it work? The game is very simple, and will allow you to create and apply a new word, as well as
